sentence: Disneys opposition to Florida legislation banning discussion of sexual orientation and gender identity in classrooms with kids third grade and younger prompted Governor Ron DeSantis and other Republicans to terminate a special municipal district the company has operated in Florida since the 1960s.
author: Christopher Palmeri
title: Disney Replaces Public Relations Chief Amid Florida Furor

sentence: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis has defended his call to eliminate the Walt Disney Company's self-governing privileges, even after a poll showed that most U.S. voters do not support governments punishing companies over political issues.
author: Emma Mayer
title: DeSantis Defends Disney Call as Poll Shows Voters Reject Company Punishment
DeSantis blasts Disney execs attack on parents: 'Walt Disney would not want that'
In DeSantis Florida, California meets its match

sentence: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis has released a payload of consequences onto the Walt Disney Company for its decision to fight policies designed to protect children from sexual content in their earliest years of education.
author: Mark Davis
title: Pushback Against DeSantis Proves the Value of His Battle With Disney | Opinion
Disney is no more political now than Walt himself was | Letters

author: Kelly Laco
title: Hawley introduces bill to strip 'woke' Disney of special copyright protections

sentence: This comes after Governor Ron Desantis months-long battle with Disney for speaking out against Floridas Parental Rights in Education? bill, also known as the Dont Say Gay? bill by the woke mob.
author: Sarah Arnold
title: Sen. Hawley Calls to Revoke Disneys Copyrights

author: Lori Rozsa
title: DeSantis says Florida may take over Disneys special district
